tidbits.title: Stunning Island Nation
tidbits.description: Palau is a stunning island nation known for its pristine beaches, vibrant coral reefs, and unique marine biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Rock Islands
tidbits.description: The Rock Islands, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, feature unique limestone formations, hidden lagoons, and picturesque diving spots.

tidbits.title: Conservation Efforts
tidbits.description: Palau is dedicated to environmental conservation, implementing measures like marine sanctuaries and sustainable tourism practices.
